articles.author: HT News Desk
articles.title: On Sudan clashes, Siddaramaiah hits back at ‘appalled’ Jaishankar - Hindustan Times
articles.description: According to the Congress leader and ex-Karnataka CM, as many as 31 people from the state were stuck in the civil war-hit African nation. | Latest News India
articles.content: If external affairs minister Subrahmanyam Jaishankar was busy getting appalled, he must point to the person who can help bring back people from Karnataka stuck in civil war-hit Sudan, former chief mi… [+2195 chars]
